  • Constructor Details

    • ProseoFilePosix

      public ProseoFilePosix(String pathInfo, Boolean fullPath, StorageManagerConfiguration cfg)
      Creates a new posix file.
      Parameters:
      pathInfo - The file path and information about file
      fullPath - Use it as full path if true, otherwise use default bucket + path info
      cfg - the Storage Manager configuration to use

    • ProseoFilePosix

      public ProseoFilePosix(String bucket, String pathInfo, StorageManagerConfiguration cfg)
      Creates a new posix file.
      Parameters:
      bucket - bucket of posix file
      pathInfo - relative path to file
      cfg - the Storage Manager configuration to use
